text: Anna Maria Gherardi (21 March 1939 â€“ 5 October 2014) was an Italian actress and voice actress. She was known for her roles in Lost Love and in Petomaniac. She was born in Bologna, Italy. Gherardi died in Rome, Italy, aged 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Emilia-Romagna Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:People from Bologna
